GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
hfs: Fix OOB Write in hfs_asc2mac

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit cff9fefdfbf5744afbb6d70bff2b49ec2065d23d, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit 328b9227865026268261a24a97a578907b280415. For more details please see the references link.
